intro_questions.text: Can you spell your family name, please?

main_questions.text: What do you do when it rains?
Where do you go to school?
What is your favorite part of the day?

respond_situations.starter_line: What do you want to drink?
respond_situations.description: You are in a café. The waiter asks you for your drink.

respond_situations.starter_line: Do you want to watch a movie?

respond_situations.description: You see a shirt in a shop. You ask the price.

ask_situations.instruction: You are with a friend. Ask for their help with your homework.
You are with your friend. You want help with your bag. ..
You are in a store. Ask the shopkeeper for the price of a shirt.

listening_script.text: I tidy my bedroom every day. I make my bed first. I put my toys away. I clean the floor. My room looks nice and neat.

questions.question: When do I tidy my room?
Why do I tidy my room?

follow_up_questions.question: When do you eat this dessert?
Where do you buy this dessert?
Why do you like this dessert?
